Dear @tingguang.wang1,
in DRIVE SW 10.0, the image capture in DW(DRIVEAV) is based on Nvmedia IPP framework.
In DRIVE OS 5.2.6 + DW 4.0 release, IPP is deprecated and replaced with NVSIPL framework. Note that, the DriveAV supported sensors in DRIVE SW 10.0 are SF3325 and SF3324 and DRIVE IX supports AR0144ATSM-GEVK

Dear @tingguang.wang1,
Entron camera is not supported with Driveworks. Please use supported sensors for using driveworks. Enabling unsupported camera for DW is out of forum support scope.

As ecosystem camera supplier, entron is only supported within nvmedia scope?

Dear @tingguang.wang1,
Please check DRIVE AGX Xavier Sensors & Accessories | NVIDIA Developer for supported cameras and compatible DRIVE release version

As clarified earlier DRIVE SW 10.0 uses IPP based framework to capture images in DRIVE AV. We later deprecated IPP and moved to SIPL framework.
Note that they are no releases targetted for DRIVE AGX Xavier platform and hence we request to use the supported cameras only.

chris.hoffman:

I had to use the NGC docker to flash 6.0.5 as I couldn’t use the SDK. In that case, where can I find the built sample or example?

You can find the source code at /usr/local/driveworks/samples/src/dnn/sample_object_detector_tracker on docker

chris.hoffman:

what are the other capabilities of nvsipl_camera?

It just shows the camera display output from live camera or can take RAW camera data as input.

chris.hoffman:

What do you mean by live camera? Are you talking about a real camera lens connected to group A?

Yes.

chris.hoffman:

We want the bounding boxes to be shown on the simulated data injected into the Orin and visualized using nvsipl_camera

nvsipl_camera is just based in NVMedia APIs. To detect bouding boxes, we need to use TensorRT framework to perform object detection and detect bouding box.

We have object detector sample in DW as a reference example which showcase object bounding box detection on live camera or recorder data. Note that, DW internally uses NVMedia(SIPL) APIs to capture camera data and TensorRT APIs to perform any DL related task.
